    • Method Detail

      • assertEqualsLRE

        public static void assertEqualsLRE(double expected,
                   double actual,
                   int lre)
        Assert that expected and actual are equal to within a certain log relative error. Log relative error measures the number of significant digits of agreement.
        Parameters:
        expected - expected value
        actual - actual value
        lre - log relative error desired

      • assertEqualsLRE

        public static void assertEqualsLRE(@NotNull
                   String message,
                   double expected,
                   double actual,
                   int lre)
        Assert that expected and actual are equal to within a certain log relative error. Log relative error measures the number of significant digits of agreement.
        Parameters:
        message - message if the test fails
        expected - expected value
        actual - actual value
        lre - log relative error desired
